topic.title: Keep this post on /g/ alive if you want ZeroNet to live
topic.body:
http://boards.4chan.org/g/thread/63401498

Just post something in the thread to bump it, so it won't die.  The longer the thread lives, the more people will know about it.

1510821243_1CxzW1WSzp2bYT7HAsLcw1wt1USDm.body: I would also like to learn Chinese and speak English fluently.  Feel free to email me through zerobit mail.

1510618291_1CyTL2ry28YCGU9LCBPhXC1ZnKcoz.body:
> [usersuse](#comment_12_1AL7MPy6rvULDRvLbmsxttSQALdYFy6GbM): Click Settings...Enter 127.0.0.1 to field 'No proxy for'Open 127.0.0.1:43110 in the Tor browser

won't this just make it so Tor isn't used at all?  Zeronet will still be serving the files I'm pretty sure.
